00051 // For example: U_MACROSERVER(UServerExample, UClientExample, UTCPSocket);
00052 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 #ifdef DEBUG
00054 #  define U_MACROSERVER(server_class,client_class,type_socket) \
00055 class server_class : public UServer<type_socket> { \
00056 public: \
00057  server_class(UFileConfig* cfg) : UServer<type_socket>(cfg) { U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(  5, server_class, "%p", cfg) } \
00058 ~server_class()                                                                                                                 { U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(5, server_class) } \
00059 const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UServer<type_socket>::dump(reset); } \
00060 protected: \
00061 virtual void newClientImage() { \
00062 U_TRACE(5, #server_class "::newClientImage()") \
00063 (void) U_NEW(client_class()); } }
00064 #else
00065 #  define U_MACROSERVER(server_class,client_class,type_socket) \
00066 class server_class : public UServer<type_socket> { \
00067 public: \
00068  server_class(UFileConfig* cfg) : UServer<type_socket>(cfg) {} \
00069 ~server_class()                                                                                                                 {} \
00070 protected: \
00071 virtual void newClientImage() { (void) new client_class(); } }
00072 #endif

00075 // manage write to log server
00076 
00077 #define U_SRV_LOG_VAR(                    fmt,args...)  { if (UServer_Base::isLog()) ULog::log("%s"fmt"\n",      UServer_Base::mod_name, args); }
00078 #define U_SRV_LOG_VAR_WITH_ADDR(fmt,args...)    { if (UServer_Base::isLog()) ULog::log("%s"fmt" %.*s\n", UServer_Base::mod_name, args, \
00079                                                                                                                                                                                                                          U_STRING_TO_TRACE(*(UClientImage_Base::pClientImage->logbuf))); }
00080 
00081 #define U_SRV_LOG_MSG(                    msg) U_SRV_LOG_VAR("%s",                              (msg))
00082 #define U_SRV_LOG_MSG_WITH_ADDR(msg) U_SRV_LOG_VAR_WITH_ADDR("%s",(msg))
00083 
00084 #define U_SRV_LOG_TIMEOUT(cimg)          U_SRV_LOG_VAR("client connected didn't send any request in %u secs (timeout), close connection %.*s", \
00085                                                                                                                                                 UServer_Base::getReqTimeout(), U_STRING_TO_TRACE(*((cimg)->logbuf)))

00091 class U_EXPORT UServer_Base : public UEventFd {
00092 public:
00093 
00094         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095         // UServer - configuration parameters
00096         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097         // USE_IPV6      flag indicating the use of ipv6
00098         // SERVER        host name or ip address for the listening socket
00099         // PORT          port number                              for the listening socket
00100         // SOCKET_NAME   file name                                        for the listening socket
00101         // IP_ADDRESS    public ip address of host for the interface connected to the Internet (autodetected if not specified)
00102         // ALLOWED_IP     list of comma separated client address for IP-based access control (IPADDR[/MASK])
00103         //
00104         // USE_TCP_OPTIMIZATION flag indicating the use of TCP/IP options to optimize data transmission (TCP_CORK, TCP_DEFER_ACCEPT, TCP_QUICKACK)
00105         //
00106         // PID_FILE      write pid on file indicated
00107         // WELCOME_MSG   message of welcome to send initially to client
00108         // RUN_AS_USER   downgrade the security to that of user account
00109         // DOCUMENT_ROOT The directory out of which you will serve your documents
00110         //
00111         // LOG_FILE      locations for file log
00112         // LOG_FILE_SZ   memory size for file log
00113         // LOG_MSG_SIZE  limit length of print network message to LOG_MSG_SIZE chars (default 128)
00114         //
00115         // PLUGIN                 list of plugins to load, a flexible way to add specific functionality to the server
00116         // PLUGIN_DIR     directory of plugins to load
00117         //
00118         // REQ_TIMEOUT    timeout for request from client
00119         // CGI_TIMEOUT    timeout for cgi execution
00120         //
00121         // MAX_KEEP_ALIVE Specifies the maximum number of requests that can be served through a Keep-Alive (Persistent) session.
00122         //                                              (Value <= 1 will disable Keep-Alive)
00123         //
00124         // CERT_FILE     server certificate
00125         // KEY_FILE      server private key
00126         // PASSWORD      password for server private key
00127         // CA_FILE       locations of trusted CA certificates used in the verification
00128         // CA_PATH       locations of trusted CA certificates used in the verification
00129         // VERIFY_MODE   mode of verification (SSL_VERIFY_NONE=0, SSL_VERIFY_PEER=1, SSL_VERIFY_FAIL_IF_NO_PEER_CERT=2, SSL_VERIFY_CLIENT_ONCE=4)
00130         //
00131         // PREFORK_CHILD number of child server processes created at startup ( 0 - serialize, no forking
00132         //                                                                     1 - classic, forking after client accept
00133         //                                                                    >1 - pool of serialized processes plus monitoring process)
00134         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00135

00202         static bool isFileInsideDocumentRoot(const UString& path)
00203                 {
00204                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::isFileInsideDocumentRoot(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(path))
00205 
00206                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(pthis)
00207 
00208                 bool result = (path.size() >= pthis->document_root.size());
00209 
00210                 U_RETURN(result);
00211                 }

00233         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00234         // Manage process server
00235         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00236         // PREFORK_CHILD number of child server processes created at startup ( 0 - serialize, no forking
00237         //                                                                     1 - classic, forking after client accept
00238         //                                                                    >1 - pool of serialized processes plus monitoring process)
00239         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00240 
00241         typedef struct shared_data {
00242                 int socket_flags;                               // socket accept descriptor flags from fcntl(fd, F_GETFL, 0)
00243                 sig_atomic_t tot_connection;
00244         } shared_data;
00245 
00246         static ULock* lock;
00247         static shared_data* ptr;
00248         static int preforked_num_kids; // keeping a pool of children and that they accept connections themselves
00249 
00250         static bool isPreForked()
00251                 {
00252                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::isPreForked()")
00253 
00254                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("preforked_num_kids = %d", preforked_num_kids)
00255 
00256                 bool result = (preforked_num_kids > 1);
00257 
00258                 U_RETURN(result);
00259                 }
00260 
00261         static bool isClassic()
00262                 {
00263                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::isClassic()")
00264 
00265                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("preforked_num_kids = %d", preforked_num_kids)
00266 
00267                 bool result = (preforked_num_kids == 1);
00268 
00269                 U_RETURN(result);
00270                 }
00271 
00272         static bool isSerialize() { return (isClassic() == false); }
00273 
00274         static void setProcessManager()
00275                 {
00276                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::setProcessManager()")
00277 
00278                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(proc,0)
00279 
00280                 proc = U_NEW(UProcess);
00281 
00282                 proc->setProcessGroup();
00283                 }
00284 
00285         static void sendSigTERM()
00286                 {
00287                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::sendSigTERM()")
00288 
00289                 UProcess::kill(0, SIGTERM); // SIGTERM is sent to every process in the process group of the calling process...
00290                 }
00291 
00292         // manage log server...
00293 
00294         static ULog* log;
00295 
00296         static bool     isLog() { return (log != 0); }
00297 
00298         static void openLog(const UString& name, uint32_t size)
00299                 {
00300                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::openLog(%.*S,%u)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(name), size)
00301 
00302                 log = U_NEW(ULog(name, size));
00303 
00304                 if (preforked_num_kids) ULog::setServer(true);
00305                 else                                                    ULog::setClient();
00306                 }

00309         static UCommand* loadConfigCommand(UFileConfig& cfg, bool bset);

00311         // check if we can go to blocking on accept()...
00312 
00313         static bool isClientConnect()
00314                 {
00315                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::isClientConnect()")
00316 
00317                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("num_connection = %d", num_connection)
00318 
00319                 bool result = (isClassic() ? proc->child()
00320                                                                                         : num_connection > 0);
00321 
00322                 U_RETURN(result);
00323                 }

00325         static int getMaxKeepAlive() { return max_Keep_Alive; }
00326 
00327         static bool isMaxKeepAlive()
00328                 {
00329                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::isMaxKeepAlive()")
00330 
00331                 bool result = (num_connection >= max_Keep_Alive);
00332 
00333                 U_RETURN(result);
00334                 }

00361         static void notifyForEventRequestConnection()
00362                 {
00363                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::notifyForEventRequestConnection()")
00364 
00365                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(pthis)
00366 
00367 #       ifndef HAVE_LIBEVENT
00368                 UNotifier::insert(pthis);
00369 #       else
00370                 pevent = U_NEW(UEvent<UServer_Base>(pthis->UEventFd::fd, EV_READ | EV_PERSIST, *pthis));
00371 
00372                 UDispatcher::add(*pevent);
00373 #       endif
00374                 }

00383         UString server,         // host name or ip address for the listening socket
00384                           as_user,              // change the current working directory to the user's home dir, and downgrade security to that user account
00385                           log_file,             // locations for file log
00386                           cert_file,    // locations for certificate of server
00387                           key_file,             // locations for private key of server
00388                           password,             // password for private key of server
00389                           ca_file,              // locations of trusted CA certificates used in the verification
00390                           ca_path,              // locations of trusted CA certificates used in the verification
00391                           allow_IP,             // Interpret a "HOST/BITS" IP mask specification. (Ex. 192.168.1.64/28)
00392                           name_sock,    // name file for the listening socket
00393                           IP_address;   // IP address of this server
00394 
00395         static int port,                                // the port number to bind to
00396                                   cgi_timeout,          // the time-out value in seconds for read output cgi process
00397                                   log_file_sz,          // memory size for file log
00398                                   verify_mode,          // mode of verification ssl connection
00399                                   max_Keep_Alive,       // Specifies the maximum number of requests that can be served through a Keep-Alive (Persistent) session
00400                                   num_connection;

00460 template <class Socket> class U_EXPORT UServer : public UServer_Base {
00461 public:
00462 
00463         UServer(UFileConfig* cfg) : UServer_Base(cfg)
00464                 {
00465                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UServer, "%p", cfg)
00466 
00467                 socket =                                                U_NEW(Socket(UClientImage_Base::bIPv6));
00468                 UClientImage_Base::init(U_NEW(Socket(UClientImage_Base::bIPv6)));
00469                 }
00470 
00471         virtual ~UServer()
00472                 {
00473                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UServer)
00474                 }
00475 
00476         static Socket* getSocket() { return (Socket*) pthis->socket; }
00477 
00478         // MANAGE ALL...
00479 
00480         void go()
00481                 {
00482                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer::go()")
00483 
00484                 UServer_Base::run(); // loop waiting for connection
00485                 }
00486 
00487         // DEBUG
00488 
00489 #ifdef DEBUG
00490         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UServer_Base::dump(reset); }
00491 #endif
00492 
00493 protected:
00494 
00495         // method VIRTUAL to redefine
00496 
00502         virtual void newClientImage()
00503                 {
00504                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer::newClientImage()")
00505 
00506 #       ifdef DEBUG
00507                 UClientImage_Base* pClientImage = U_NEW(UClientImage<Socket>);
00508 
00509                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(pClientImage, UClientImage_Base::pClientImage)
00510 #       else
00511                 (void) U_NEW(UClientImage<Socket>);
00512 #       endif
00513                 }
00514 
00515 private:
00516         UServer(const UServer&) : UServer_Base(0) {}
00517         UServer& operator=(const UServer&)                      { return *this; }
00518 };
00519 
00520 #ifdef HAVE_SSL // specializzazione con USSLSocket
00521 
00522 template <> class U_EXPORT UServer<USSLSocket> : public UServer_Base {
00523 public:
00524 
00525         UServer(UFileConfig* cfg) : UServer_Base(cfg)
00526                 {
00527                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UServer<USSLSocket>, "%p", cfg)
00528 
00529                 USSLSocket::method        = (SSL_METHOD*) SSLv23_server_method();
00530                 USocket::accept4_flags = 0;
00531 
00532                 socket =                                                U_NEW(USSLSocket(UClientImage_Base::bIPv6));
00533                 UClientImage_Base::init(U_NEW(USSLSocket(UClientImage_Base::bIPv6, getSocket()->ctx)));
00534                 }
00535 
00536         virtual ~UServer()
00537                 {
00538                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UServer<USSLSocket>)
00539                 }
00540 
00541         // SERVICES
00542 
00543         static USSLSocket* getSocket() { return (USSLSocket*) pthis->socket; }
00544 
00545         // MANAGE ALL...
00546 
00547         void go()
00548                 {
00549                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer<USSLSocket>::go()")
00550 
00551                 USSLSocket* sslsocket = getSocket();
00552 
00553                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(sslsocket->isSSL(), true)
00554                 
00555                 // These are the 1024 bit DH parameters from "Assigned Number for SKIP Protocols"
00556                 // (http://www.skip-vpn.org/spec/numbers.html).
00557                 // See there for how they were generated.
00558 
00559                 sslsocket->useDHFile();
00560 
00561                 // Load our certificate
00562 
00563                 if (sslsocket->setContext(cert_file.c_str(), key_file.c_str(), password.c_str(),
00564                                                                                          ca_file.c_str(),  ca_path.c_str(), verify_mode) == false)
00565                         {
00566                         U_ERROR("SSL setContext() failed...", 0);
00567                         }
00568 
00569                 UServer_Base::run(); // loop waiting for connection
00570                 }
00571 
00572         // DEBUG
00573 
00574 #ifdef DEBUG
00575         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UServer_Base::dump(reset); }
00576 #endif
00577 
00578 protected:
00579 
00580         // method VIRTUAL to redefine
00581 
00587         virtual void newClientImage()
00588                 {
00589                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer<USSLSocket>::newClientImage()")
00590 
00591 #       ifdef DEBUG
00592                 UClientImage_Base* pClientImage = U_NEW(UClientImage<USSLSocket>);
00593 
00594                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(pClientImage, UClientImage_Base::pClientImage)
00595 #       else
00596                 (void) U_NEW(UClientImage<USSLSocket>);
00597 #       endif
00598                 }
00599 
00600 private:
00601         UServer<USSLSocket>(const UServer<USSLSocket>&) : UServer_Base(0) {}
00602         UServer<USSLSocket>& operator=(const UServer<USSLSocket>&)                 { return *this; }
00603 };
00604 
00605 #endif
